text: Uncle was incredibly patient and understanding. Came in to have my passport photo taken. He offered guidance regarding posture and facial angles. I informed him I needed my passport photo done in a day, and he was very accommodating to my request, taking only 20 minutes w editing, etc. I highly recommend this place if you want to get your passport photo taken. My photo came out beautifully, He’s fast and efficient not to mention he’s really friendly!!

It’s so difficult to find a good photo shop these days. But LK is definitely one of the best. The owner is kind patience and friendly. Even when it’s a simple passport photo, he goes the extra mile to make you look good. It’s a wonderful experience compared to the clinical staff who doesn’t care, at the other shops I have been to.

A compact yet well-equipped photo studio using professional DSLR and softbox lighting for high-quality passport photos. The attentive owner provides guidance on face angles and posture to achieve the best results. Customers can choose from 5 to 6 final shots, with post-production touch-ups enhancing the images. Exceptional value at just $18, which includes eight printed copies and a digital version.

I have engaged LK Photo Service for almost 20years for family photos, passport photos, and found out Mr. Bernard always provides friendly, professional service to me with affordable prices with good quality of work. This is my 1st time commenting about LK Photo Service which has been serving Ang Mo Kio community for a long period of time by Bernard. Bernard is a very honest & humble businessman with great professional service in Photography, every time i enter his shop I always enjoy his photos & achievements, his photos show his journey as a professional and enjoyable to see his works for long period of his career. Keep up your great work Bernard.

very good service!!!very nice and funny!! Still give me advice and let me choose the pic I want and help me edit photo :P really highly recommend this shop and the google review really trustable !!! Thank you uncle!!!
